title: Desktop app close and couldn't restart trying to train a model
body:
Hi all!
I don't know if it is the right place to report this issue. 

When I was trying to "train" my own model, I had selected "caterpillars" to fine-tune a model. 
At one point, the platform shows me this manipulation tool:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6944598/81249217-838bf080-8ff4-11ea-9a1d-df56358fa876.png)

I didn't know how to continue, I couldn't close that modal view (cancel or accept?)

So I supposed the best solution may be restart the app. I pressed alt+f4 and the software closed. 

And now, I could't start it again. CLI shows this: 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6944598/81249440-fb5a1b00-8ff4-11ea-9b7b-2064cf2b6022.png)

**System**:  Kernel: 4.15.0-96-generic x86_64
**Distro**: Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS
**Product**: Aspire A515-51
**CPU**:  Dual core Intel Core i5-7200U
